message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $11,000.  I believe it will be highly beneficial to you, and this price reflects the value it holds.
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Can you consider that price?

Hi Bob, thanks for your interest.  While I understand your offer, I'm looking for a price closer to $10,500.  This product provides significant value, and I'm confident you'll see a great return on that investment.
Hi Alice, I understand the product has value, but I'm still a bit hesitant at $10,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $10,000. Can you consider that price?
